result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam James Boone

records.addlTxt: 3:59 PM Court calls 22cm30, 22cm52, 22cm62. Defendant Adam James Boone not in court.  Attorney Kelly L Hays in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. State moves to complete forfeiture in 22cm30 and 22cm52 and requests new warrant on 22cm62 for $1,000.00 cash or body for the State of Wisconsin. Court orders bonds forfeited in 22cm30 and 22cm52. 22cm62 Court orders bond forfeited pending hearing and authorizes warrant body only.
The event type entered in error, should have been called Bail/ Bond Forfeiture Hearing could not erase because tied with DNA however probable cause previously checked.

3:09 PM Defendant Adam James Boone not in court.  Attorney Kelly Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. State moves to forfeit bond 22CM52 $1,850 & 22CM30 $350.00 and request $1,000 cash or body state wide.  Court notes def. was in court when hearing scheduled.  Def. paid court appointed atty.  Court authorize warrant $1,000 for each case, or body and forfeits bond pending hearing.

1:53 PM Defendant Adam James Boone in court.  Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom.  Court reviews history of case. Court has not appointed attorney yet.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

01:54 PM Defendant Adam James Boone in court.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Def. filed petition for court appointed atty.  Court gives def. order. Bond continues.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

02:08 PM Defendant Adam James Boone in court.  Kelly L Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given 3 options, PD, hire own or court appointed atty. Def. would like to have an attorney. State gives bail/bond recommendation. Court orders $350 cash bond, already posted with conditions. Def. to contact with P.D.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
